translations: 魔豆国际双语学校（Beanstalk International Bilingual School）

sentences.sentence: Lose those ponchos, go and get your bibs!
sentences.translation: 丢掉那些雨布，去拿你的围嘴来！

sentences.sentence: I have found some great deals on items that you need everyday, like bottles and bibs.
sentences.translation: 我发现一些大的项目，你需要交易，每天象瓶和领巾。

sentences.sentence: Motorbike taxi drivers tote fluorescent orange bibs marked with "ma Ellen say don't kill me oh!"
sentences.translation: 摩托车出租车司机们拿着荧光橙色的标幅上面写着：“艾伦不要杀我！”
